name: 1800: A Lo-fi Fantasy RPG
description:
BAND TOGETHER TO DEFEND AGAINST OTHERWORLDLY THREATS

Creatures of the night wreak havoc upon human lives. Some of it sporadic and unprovoked, some of it well overdue. But you have allies beside you. The dangers of the supernatural can make strange bedfellows, but a helping hand can provide a small light in the darkest hour of those initiated in the occult.

1800 is a hack of 24XX, a lo-fi scifi RPG system by Jason Tocci, under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license (CC BY 4.0)

Cover art by Beeple (Mike Winkelmann)
